task_background: Prepare the DSP Laboratory for an important demonstration of fixed-point FIR filter capabilities, ensuring all equipment is functional, organized, and ready for collaborative work.

tasks.task_description: Place the oscilloscope probe set with id 'oscilloscope_probe_set_1' onto the 'rack_mounted_signal_analyzer_1'.
Find the heaviest, metal object on the steel workbench and place it in the storage component shelves.
Use the keycard to unlock the calibration jig on the steel workbench.
Find the only blinking soldering iron station on the steel workbench and turn it off.
